title: Transfer completed update from 1 pc to another
body: I installed leauge on my pc  and laptop and my laptop game is good to go but my pc is taking awhile can i transfer the update from one pc to another so i dont have to wait for it to update

replies.body:
Technically you can copy the entire **C:\Riot Games** over from one PC to another. You should be okay, but if you run into any issues with the transfer, you may need to end up cleanly reinstalling League.

Let me know if you have any questions.
